channel.title: Please Help. Simple error
channel.description: ok i edited my complier by putting "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" ClientFiles/*.java this in it. i put the same thing in my run server and it wont work. it keeps on saying "Java" is not reconized as a internal or external command. What do i put in my runserver that will make it work? I use jdk 6.7.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2008, 04:08:01 pm[/size][hr]can anyone please help?

item.title: Please Help. Simple error

item.description:
@Onono6 wrote:

ok i edited my complier by putting “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” ClientFiles/*.java this in it. i put the same thing in my run server and it wont work. it keeps on saying “Java” is not reconized as a internal or external command. What do i put in my runserver that will make it work? I use jdk 6.7.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2008, 04:08:01 pm[/size][hr]can anyone please help?
